name:
Super Smash Bros.™
for Nintendo 3DS: Update
description:
An update for Super Smash Bros.™
for Nintendo 3DS is now available
from Nintendo eShop.

This will update the software to
Version 1.1.7 with the following
amendments:

・The Cloud, Corrin and Bayonetta amiibo can now be used with this game.

After downloading this update, you
will be unable to play using local
wireless or play online with
players using older versions, or view
replays saved before the update.

You will need to install Ver. 1.1.7
to play online.

We apologize for any inconvenience
caused, and recommend downloading
this update to ensure a smooth game
experience.
